casebody.data:
In the Matter of Carl DRUCKER, Bankrupt-Appellee, David Berlinger, Creditor-Appellant. No. 170. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 10, 1938. Benjamin Bayers, of New York City (Samuel Masía, of New York City, of counsel), for creditor-appellant. Duberstein & Schwartz, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Max Schwartz and Samuel C. Duberstein, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., on the brief), for bankrupt-appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
